name: TrickOrTreat
description:
Game made for 48 hour Spooky 2D Jam '21.

Catch the Candies and Lollipops while avoiding the evil pumpkins. There are ghosts trying to attack you from behind. Look behind you from time to time to shoot the ghosts.

Missing to catch the treats will cause you to lose a life!!

Art, music and programming made by me ( ASK12350 ) during the jam time.

Keys:

A/LeftArrow : Move Left

D/RightArrow : Move Right

W/UpArrow : Look Up

S/DownArrow : Look Down

LeftClick/Space : Shoot Bullets (Only works when u r looking down).
